library(infographiq)

<base target="_parent">

```{r}
tryCatch(
    plot_timeseries(
        csv_tv  = "http://oceanview.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/cciea_AC.csvp?time%2Csalmon_coastwide&time%3E=1980-01-01&time%3C=2014-01-01",
        title   = "Salmon Landings (coastwide mostly chinook)",
        y_label = "1000s metric tons",
        skip    = 0,
        filter  = NULL,
        col_t   = "time (UTC)",
        col_y   = "salmon_coastwide (1000s metric tons)",
        group_by= NULL
    ),
    error = function(e) e
)
```
